items.summary: Add 30 new high-quality AI prompt records distributed across the existing backend categories (#videoGeneration, #photoGeneration, #cgiAds, #marketing, #storytelling, #business, #socialMedia, #design) so they are persisted in the canister state and returned by the existing prompt listing APIs (e.g., getAllPrompts, getPromptsByCategory). Each new prompt must include: title, description, fullText, tags, and correct values for isPopular/isNew/isPremium.

Ensure the newly added prompts are visible in the existing Prompt Library UI by relying on the current prompt fetch flow (useGetAllPrompts â†’ PromptLibraryPage) without adding new UI controls or requiring manual admin creation steps.
